oop1314.lab04.robot.abstractclasses

Class ComposableRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop1314.lab04.robot.core.Robot
      • oop1314.lab04.robot.abstractclasses.ComposableRobot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RobotWithArmsAndTempSensor

    public class ComposableRobot
extends Robot
    Concrete implementation of a robot composed by a set of generic IRobotPart
    Author:
    Andrea Santi

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRobotPart[] getParts() 
      void logPartStatus()
      Log the status of all the robot parts
      void turnOffAll()
      Turn off all the IRobotPart invoking the method IRobotPart.turnOff() for each one of them
      void turnOnAll()
      Turn on all the IRobotPart invoking the method IRobotPart.turnOn() for each one of them
      void workWithMovementParts()
      Invoke the AbstractMovementPart.doMove() method for all the AbstractMovementPart available
